TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IPGlobalProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本機電腦之網路連接的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the network connectivity of the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供設定和本機電腦的網路介面和網路連線的統計資訊。This class provides configuration and statistical information about the local computer's network interfaces and network connections. 這個類別所提供的資訊是類似於網際網路通訊協定協助程式 API 函數所提供。The information provided by this class is similar to that provided by the Internet Protocol Helper API functions. 如網際網路通訊協定協助程式的相關資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的文件。For information about the Internet Protocol Helper, see the documentation in the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此類別的執行個體的本機電腦的相關資訊。The following code example displays information about the local computer using an instance of this class. [!code-cpp[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NclNetInfo2#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能由衍生自的類別可以呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor can be called only by classes derived from .

summary.span: 開始非同步要求，以便從本機電腦擷取穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request to retrieve the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer.
An that references the asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援的輸出連線，或接受 Teredo 介面上的連入連線，應用程式需要確定 Teredo 介面已啟動，並可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 這是因為 Teredo 可以進入休眠狀態時不會用於一段時間。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法可讓應用程式以非同步方式擷取的穩定單點傳播 IP 位址清單。The method allows an application to asynchronously retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 屬性可用來判斷 IP 位址是否為 IPv6 Teredo 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也會傳回非 Teredo 位址，並提供更便利的方式，來取得單點傳播 IP 位址，比列舉所有系統上本機電腦，以及查詢相關聯的 IP 位址的物件。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

exception.span: 在平台上未實作這個方法。

span.span: This method is not implemented on the platform.

exception.span: 這個方法會使用 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本支援的原生 函式。

span.span: This method uses the native function that is supported on Windows Vista and later.

exception.span: 呼叫原生 函式失敗。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

span.span: A instance that contains the computer's DHCP scope name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DHCP 領域是相同的子網路上的網路電腦系統管理群組。A DHCP scope is an administrative grouping of networked computers that are on the same subnet. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路資訊。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. summary.span: 結束暫止的非同步要求，以便從本機電腦擷取穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援的輸出連線，或接受 Teredo 介面上的連入連線，應用程式需要確定 Teredo 介面已啟動，並可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 這是因為 Teredo 可以進入休眠狀態時不會用於一段時間。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法可讓應用程式以非同步方式擷取的穩定單點傳播 IP 位址清單。The method allows an application to asynchronously retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 屬性可用來判斷 IP 位址是否為 IPv6 Teredo 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法結束暫止的非同步要求，以擷取穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格。The method ends a pending asynchronous request to retrieve the stable unicast IP address table. 方法也會傳回非 Teredo 位址，並提供更便利的方式，來取得單點傳播 IP 位址，比列舉所有系統上本機電腦，以及查詢相關聯的 IP 位址的物件。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.TcpConnectionInformation[] GetActiveTcpConnections() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetActiveTcpConnections () As TcpConnectionInformation()

summary.span: 傳回本機電腦上之網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections on the local computer.

returns.span: 陣列，包含描述現用 TCP 連接的物件，但如果沒有偵測到現用 TCP 連接則為空陣列。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the active TCP connections, or an empty array if no active TCP connections are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的物件以外的所有 TCP 狀態中包含連線狀態。The objects returned by this method include connections in all TCP states except the state. 您可以呼叫來檢查連接狀態。You can check the state of a connection by calling . TCP 通訊協定被定義在 IETF RFC 793。The TCP protocol is defined in IETF RFC 793. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映這個陣列建立時間為準的連線。Note that the objects returned by this method reflect the connections as of the time the array is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用中 TCP 連線的端點資訊。The following example displays endpoint information for active TCP connections. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#17)]

exception.span: Win32 函式 失敗。

span.span: The Win32 function failed.
for reading network information.

summary.span: 傳回本機電腦上之網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 接聽程式的端點資訊。

span.span: Returns endpoint information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) listeners on the local computer.

returns.span: 陣列，包含描述現用 TCP 接聽程式的物件，但如果沒有偵測到現用 TCP 接聽程式則為空陣列。

span.span: A array that contains objects that describe the active TCP listeners, or an empty array, if no active TCP listeners are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的物件以外的所有 TCP 狀態中包含接聽程式狀態。The objects returned by this method include listeners in all TCP states except the state. TCP 通訊協定被定義在 IETF RFC 793。The TCP protocol is defined in IETF RFC 793. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映這個陣列建立時間為準的連線。Note that the objects returned by this method reflect the connections as of the time the array is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示現用 TCP 接聽程式的端點資訊。The following code example displays endpoint information for active TCP listeners. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#18](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#18)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.IPEndPoint[] GetActiveUdpListeners() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetActiveUdpListeners () As IPEndPoint()

summary.span: 傳回本機電腦上之網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 和 IPv6 使用者資料包通訊協定 (User Datagram Protocol，UDP) 接聽程式的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) and IPv6 User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listeners on the local computer.

returns.span: 陣列，包含描述 UDP 接聽程式的物件，但如果沒有偵測到 UDP 接聽程式則為空陣列。

span.span: An array that contains objects that describe the UDP listeners, or an empty array if no UDP listeners are detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UDP 是沒有連線的傳輸層通訊協定，負責傳送和接收的資料包。UDP is a connectionless transport layer protocol that is responsible for sending and receiving datagrams. 它被定義在 IETF RFC 768。It is defined in IETF RFC 768. UDP 接聽程式已開啟的通訊端等候，並接收 UDP 資料包。A UDP listener is an open socket that waits for and receives UDP datagrams. 因為 UDP 無連線的通訊協定，接聽程式不會維護遠端端點的連線。Because UDP is a connectionless protocol, the listener does not maintain a connection to a remote endpoint. ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用中的 UDP 接聽程式。The following example displays the active UDP listeners. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#19)]

summary.span: 提供本機電腦的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (Internet Control Message Protocol，ICMP) 第 4 版統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) version 4 statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 物件，提供本機電腦的 ICMP 第 4 版流量統計資料。

span.span: An object that provides ICMP version 4 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMP 是一組與網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 搭配使用的訊息。ICMP is a set of messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). IPv4 的節點，以報告錯誤發生在處理資料封包，以及執行其他的網際網路層函式會使用 ICMP。ICMP is used by IPv4 nodes to report errors encountered in processing data packets and to perform other Internet layer functions. ICMP 第 4 版被定義在 IETF RFC 792。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 如需可用於應用程式的 ICMP 第 4 版流量統計資料的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the ICMP version 4 traffic statistics that are available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映在物件建立時間為準的統計資料。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前的 ICMPv4 統計資料。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

summary.span: 提供本機電腦的網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (Internet Control Message Protocol，ICMP) 第 6 版統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) version 6 statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 物件，提供本機電腦的 ICMP 第 6 版流量統計資料。

span.span: An object that provides ICMP version 6 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMP 第 6 版是一組用於與網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 的訊息。ICMP version 6 is a set of messages for use with Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6). IPv6 節點，以報告錯誤發生在處理資料封包，以及執行其他的網際網路層函式會使用 ICMP。ICMP is used by IPv6 nodes to report errors encountered in processing data packets and to perform other Internet layer functions. ICMP 第 6 版被定義在 IETF RFC 1885。ICMP version 6 is defined in IETF RFC 1885. Windows 2000 或舊版作業系統的電腦不支援 IPv6 通訊協定。The IPv6 protocol is not supported for computers with Windows 2000 or earlier operating systems. 如需 ICMP 第 6 版流量統計資料提供給應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the ICMP version 6 traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映在物件建立時間為準的統計資料。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前的 ICMPv6 統計資料。The following example displays the current ICMPv6 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#7)]

summary.span: 提供本機電腦的網際網路通訊協定第 4 版 (IPv4) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 物件，其提供本機電腦的 IPv4 流量統計資料。

span.span: An object that provides IPv4 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IPv4 是負責從其來源電腦至其目的地的資料封包路由的網路層通訊協定。IPv4 is a network layer protocol that is responsible for routing data packets from its source computer to its destination. 如需應用程式可用的 IP 流量統計資料的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the IP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映的統計資料的時間為準建立物件。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的 IP 統計資料。The following code example displays IP statistics for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

summary.span: 提供本機電腦的網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) statistical data for the local computer.

returns.span: 物件，其提供本機電腦的 IPv6 流量統計資料。

span.span: An object that provides IPv6 traffic statistics for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IPv6 是網路層通訊協定，專門負責路由傳送資料封包從來源電腦至其目的地。IPv6 is a network layer protocol responsible for routing data packets from its source computer to its destination. 在 Windows 2000 或舊版作業系統的電腦上不支援 IPv6 通訊協定。The IPv6 protocol is not supported on computers with Windows 2000 or earlier operating systems. 如需應用程式可用的 IP 流量統計資料的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the IP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映的統計資料的時間為準建立物件。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的 IP 統計資料。The following code example displays IP statistics for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks TCP 是負責可靠地傳送和接收資料封包傳輸層通訊協定。TCP is a transport layer protocol that is responsible for reliably sending and receiving data packets. 它被定義在 IETF RFC 793。It is defined in IETF RFC 793. 如需應用程式可用的 TCP 流量統計資料的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the TCP traffic statistics available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映的統計資料的時間為準建立物件。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示本機電腦的 TCP/IP 統計資料。The following example displays the TCP/IP statistics for the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks UDP 是沒有連線的傳輸層通訊協定，負責傳送和接收的資料包。UDP is a connectionless transport layer protocol that is responsible for sending and receiving datagrams. 它被定義在 IETF RFC 768。It is defined in IETF RFC 768. 如需 UDP 流量統計資料所提供的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For details on the UDP traffic statistics that are available to applications, see the class documentation. 請注意，這個方法所傳回的物件會反映的統計資料的時間為準建立物件。Note that the object returned by this method reflects the statistics as of the time the object is created. 這項資訊不會動態更新。This information is not updated dynamically. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示本機電腦的 UDP/IP 統計資料。The following example displays the UDP/IP statistics for the local computer. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection GetUnicastAddresses() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetUnicastAddresses () As UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection

abstract member GetUnicastAddresses : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection override this.GetUnicastAddresses : unit -> System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection

summary.span: 從本機電腦擷取穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格。

span.span: Retrieves the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer.

returns.span: ，包含本機電腦上的穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格清單。

span.span: A that contains a list of stable unicast IP addresses on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援的輸出連線，或接受 Teredo 介面上的連入連線，應用程式需要確定 Teredo 介面已啟動，並可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 這是因為 Teredo 可以進入休眠狀態時不會用於一段時間。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法可讓應用程式擷取的穩定單點傳播 IP 位址清單。The method will allow an application to retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses. 屬性可用來判斷 IP 位址是否為 IPv6 Teredo 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也會傳回非 Teredo 位址，並提供更便利的方式，來取得單點傳播 IP 位址，比列舉所有系統上本機電腦，以及查詢相關聯的 IP 位址的物件。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

exception.span: 呼叫原生 函式失敗。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

exception.span: 在平台上未實作這個方法。

span.span: This method is not implemented on the platform.

exception.span: 這個方法會使用 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本支援的原生 函式。

span.span: This method uses the native function that is supported on Windows Vista and later.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的 權限。

span.span: The caller does not have necessary permission.

exception.span: 呼叫原生 函式失敗。

span.span: The call to the native function failed.

Public Overridable Function GetUnicastAddressesAsync () As Task(Of UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection)

abstract member GetUnicastAddressesAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection> override this.GetUnicastAddressesAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.NetworkInformation.UnicastIPAddressInformationCollection>

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，從本機電腦擷取穩定單點傳播 IP 位址表格。

span.span: Retrieves the stable unicast IP address table on the local computer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援的輸出連線，或接受 Teredo 介面上的連入連線，應用程式需要確定 Teredo 介面已啟動，並可供使用。In order to support outbound connections or to accept incoming connections on a Teredo interface, applications need to ensure that the Teredo interface is up and ready for use. 這是因為 Teredo 可以進入休眠狀態時不會用於一段時間。This is because Teredo can go into a dormant state when not used for some period of time. 方法可讓應用程式擷取非同步作業的穩定單點傳播 IP 位址清單。The method will allow an application to retrieve the list of stable unicast IP addresses as asynchronous operation. 屬性可用來判斷 IP 位址是否為 IPv6 Teredo 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。The property can be used to determine if an IP address is an IPv6 Teredo address with the prefix of 2001::/32. 方法也會傳回非 Teredo 位址，並提供更便利的方式，來取得單點傳播 IP 位址，比列舉所有系統上本機電腦，以及查詢相關聯的 IP 位址的物件。The method also returns non-Teredo addresses and provides a more convenient way to obtain the unicast IP addresses for a system than enumerating all the objects on a local computer and querying the associated IP addresses.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HostName As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ HostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得本機電腦的主機名稱。

span.span: Gets the host name for the local computer.

value.span: 執行個體，包含電腦的 NetBIOS 名稱。

span.span: A instance that contains the computer's NetBIOS name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會呼叫至原生的 IP 協助程式函式，GetNetworkParams，傳回 FIXED_INFO 結構，其中包含 NetBIOS 主機名稱的字串。This property calls into the native IP Helper function, GetNetworkParams, which returns a FIXED_INFO structure that contains the NetBIOS host name string. 主機名稱字串會截斷超過 15 個字元時。The host name string is truncated when it exceeds 15 characters. 電腦的 NetBIOS 名稱必須是唯一的網路內，而且不完整的網域名稱。A computer's NetBIOS name must be unique within a network and is not fully qualified by the domain name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路資訊。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#15)]

exception.span: Win32 函式呼叫失敗。

span.span: A Win32 function call failed.
for reading network information.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 取得 值，指定本機電腦是否當做 Windows 網際網路名稱服務 (WINS) Proxy 來使用。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the local computer is acting as a Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) proxy.

value.span: 如果本機電腦是 WINS Proxy，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the local computer is a WINS proxy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINS 提供分散式的資料庫，用以登錄及查詢的 IP 位址對應到動態的 NetBIOS 名稱。WINS provides a distributed database for registering and querying dynamic NetBIOS names to IP address mappings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路資訊。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NodeType As NetBiosNodeType

summary.span: 取得本機電腦的網路基本輸入輸出系統 (NetBIOS) 節點型別。

span.span: Gets the Network Basic Input/Output System (NetBIOS) node type of the local computer.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點類型會決定解析為 IP 位址的 NetBIOS 名稱的方式。The node type determines the way in which NetBIOS names are resolved to IP addresses. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For additional information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機電腦的網路資訊。The following code example displays network information for the local computer. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#15)]
